revision.comment: Text replacement - "[[Category:Used for Summary Timeline Extension]]" to "[[Category:Template Used for Summary Timeline Extension]]"
revision.text: <noinclude> [[Category:Template Used for Summary Timeline Extension]] </noinclude><includeonly> &&&{{{?Title|}}}@@@{{{?Duration hour|}}}@@@{{{?Duration minute|}}}@@@{{{?Related article|}}}@@@{{{?Color|}}}@@@{{{?Free text|}}} </includeonly>

revision.comment: Text replacement - "[[Category:Used for Summary Timeline Extension]]" to "[[Category:Template Used for Summary Timeline Extension]]"
revision.text:
For the compact version (default): 
{{Summary Timeline Output | Page name of summary timeline to display | Compact }}
To force the compact version to a fixed pixel width to fit on a specific page: 
{{Summary Timeline Output | Page name of summary timeline to display | Compact | 123 }}
For the full version: 
{{Summary Timeline Output | Page name of summary timeline to display | Full }}

revision.comment: Text replacement - "[[Category:Used for Summary Timeline Extension]]" to "[[Category:Template Used for Summary Timeline Extension]]"
revision.text:
Use this format: 
{{Actor 1 Task
|Title=
|Duration=
|Color=
|Related articles=
|Free text=
}}

{{Task
|Actor={{{Actor 1 name|}}}
|Title={{{Title|}}}
|Duration hour={{{Duration hour|}}}
|Duration minute={{{Duration minute|}}}
|Color={{{Color|}}}
|Related article={{{Related article|}}}
|Free text={{{Free text|}}}
}}

revision.comment: Text replacement - "[[Category:Used for Summary Timeline Extension]]" to "[[Category:Template Used for Summary Timeline Extension]]"
revision.text:
This is the "Summary Timeline" template. It should be called by using the Summary Timeline form. Edit the page to see the template text. [[Category:Template Used for Summary Timeline Extension]] {{#vardefine:EVATitle|{{{EVA Title|}}}}} {{#vardefine:pageRelatedArticle|{{#arraymap:{{{Related article|}}}|,|x|[[x]]}}}} {{#vardefine:EVADurationHour|{{{EVA Duration hour|}}}}} {{#vardefine:EVADurationMinute|{{{EVA Duration minute|}}}}} {{#vardefine:DependsOn|{{{Depends on|}}}}} {{#vardefine:ColorGrayMeaning|{{{Color Gray Meaning|}}}}} {{#vardefine:ColorRedMeaning|{{{Color Red Meaning|}}}}} {{#vardefine:ColorOrangeMeaning|{{{Color Orange Meaning|}}}}} {{#vardefine:ColorYellowMeaning|{{{Color Yellow Meaning|}}}}} {{#vardefine:ColorBlueMeaning|{{{Color Blue Meaning|}}}}} {{#vardefine:ColorGreenMeaning|{{{Color Green Meaning|}}}}} {{#vardefine:ColorPinkMeaning|{{{Color Pink Meaning|}}}}} {{#vardefine:ColorPurpleMeaning|{{{Color Purple Meaning|}}}}} {{#vardefine:Actor1name|{{{Actor 1 name|Actor 1}}}}} {{#vardefine:Actor2name|{{{Actor 2 name|Actor 2}}}}} {{#vardefine:Actor3name|{{{Actor 3 name|Actor 3}}}}} {{#set: EVA Title = {{{EVA Title|}}} }} {{#set: Duration hour = {{{EVA Duration hour|}}} }} {{#set: Duration minute = {{{EVA Duration minute|}}} }} {{#set: Depends on = {{{Depends on|}}} }} {{#set: Actor 1 name = {{{Actor 1 name|Actor 1}}} }} {{#set: Actor 2 name = {{{Actor 2 name|Actor 2}}} }} {{#set: Actor 3 name = {{{Actor 3 name|Actor 3}}} }} {{#set: Actor 1 Display in Compact View = {{{Actor 1 Display in Compact View|}}} }} {{#set: Actor 2 Display in Compact View = {{{Actor 2 Display in Compact View|}}} }} {{#set: Actor 3 Display in Compact View = {{{Actor 3 Display in Compact View|}}} }} {{#set: Actor 1 Enable Get Aheads = {{{Actor 1 Enable Get Aheads|}}} }} {{#set: Actor 2 Enable Get Aheads = {{{Actor 2 Enable Get Aheads|}}} }} {{#set: Actor 3 Enable Get Aheads = {{{Actor 3 Enable Get Aheads|}}} }} == Extension Output == To display the output on another page, use the following template: Compact version: {{Summary Timeline Output | {{PAGENAME}} }} Compact version with fixed pixel width (change "400"): {{Summary Timeline Output | {{PAGENAME}} | Compact | 400 }} Full version: {{Summary Timeline Output | {{PAGENAME}} | Full }} {{Summary Timeline Output | {{PAGENAME}} }} {{Summary Timeline Output | {{PAGENAME}} | Full }} == Raw Template Output == {{{EVA Title|}}} ({{{EVA Duration hour|}}}:{{{EVA Duration minute|}}}) Gray:{{{Color Gray Meaning|}}} Red: {{{Color Red Meaning|}}} Orange:{{{Color Orange Meaning|}}} Yellow:{{{Color Yellow Meaning|}}} Blue:{{{Color Blue Meaning|}}} Green:{{{Color Green Meaning|}}} Pink:{{{Color Pink Meaning|}}} Purple:{{{Color Purple Meaning|}}}
